title: Nice view to the city and acropolis
text:
I recomend use funicular way up to hill and walk back.
On the summit is caffee - bar where you can enjoy cup of coffe.

title: One of the best meal in athens
text:
Resonable prices, good service, delicious local food and wine. Highly recomend to try.
Very close to Syntagma square.

title: The best is view to acropolis during dinner from a restaurant
text:
Must to see, but do not expect something amazing, it is the rest of ancient ruin.
Try visit mout Lycabetos. (nice view to acropolis)

title: Must to see it but do not expect nothing special
text:
Recomend visit the Partheon during autumn.
Free entrance on public holiday.
20eur entrance
30eur combined entrance

title: Delicious sushi
text:
The sushi was delicious but little bit expensive.
Expect about 100eur for 4 person with bottle of wine

title: Must see this dominant feature of Dolomity
text: You must pay fee 30 euro (7/2018) for way to Lavaredo parking (2200m) from Misurina. The journey around the Tre cime is easy and beautiful. If you like via ferrata, you can climb to innnrefler peak(A/B tour). Highly recomended ferrata. At the half journey is next mountain cottage Loccateli when you can drink, eat a go to the toilet.

title: Nice lake next to biathlon stadium
text: It is perfect for walking aroud the lake. It is close to biathlon stadium and close to next lake Obrsee behind Ausrian border. perfect for family, pair even stop for motobikers.

title: Perfect view to lake and really big appartmant.
text: Perfect, calm hotel on the shore of lake. Rooms are super clean. The is included saunas, jacuzzi... Furniture and equipment are made from real wood and are beauty. Staff is amazing. Speak english, deuch and Italian, even one of the staff speak Slovak language.

title: Quiet, clean, well equippe camp
text:
Camp provide nice clean and quiet place suitable for family, pairs and hikers. The camp is situated 3km behind city Cortina... next to the nice river. The camp has bar (pizza, grocerry), washing dishing rom, laundry, clean toilets.
There is posible rent static caravan with wood vestibul.

title: Cheap, delicious, familial.
text: Calm a familiar environment of the restaurant is amazing. It worth to visit. Cheap and delicious Sri lanka food.

title: More than average services.
text: All aircrafts were equipped an entertaiment system. A Wifi on board (15min free). The food qiute better than ussually. Alcohol like Cougnac VSOP and others are free on board for economic class.

title: Perfekt and delicious Srí Lanka food
text: Delicious and perfekt services. In fact it is something like all you can eat, but Srí Lanka food. Recomend to visit

title: Best ice cream
text: One of the best ice cream what I have ever had. Really delicious. You do not miss if you like ice cream.

title: Nice place which you should see in Srí lanka
text: The Sigiriya is very nice and clean place. Hiking is very easy even for older people. However, you should start to hike in the morning because of high temperature.

title: Do not forget the tickets.
text: If you come from the side of Gold budha, you must go up turn left and down around the hill to the ticket counter. You must buy before hicking!

title: If you want to avoid overcrowded peak...
text: If you want to avoid a long queue and you accept to see sunset is the go at 3 pm. The jorney takes 2 hours if you hurry otherwise 3 hours.

title: Huge party every night.
text:
This beach is suitable for dancing and drinking party people. Party began at 3PM until 6 PM.
The beach provide except restaurant also very good facilities as boats, bungee jump etc..

title: Amaring night view.
text: Very nice place especially for pair traveled. Very romantic ancient town. In the side streets is market, where you can buy everything.

title: Everything in one place.
text: If you lide shopping. Dont forget visit the Centra market. You can buy here, souveniers, food and can see any good like slipper made from old pneumatic.

title: Indian restaurant. Chicken vidaloo is not too much spicy
text: Very nice environment and service. The food was delicious. Dont afraid of order very spicy. Is not spicy as ussual.

title: The best beach in the Vietnam.
text: According to me the best beach in the Island and in the Vietnam as well. If you are in the Phu quoc. You should visit it.

title: Front beach bar.
text: It is front beach bar, but in the nice place, good service and prices. Suitable for chillout with anybody.

title: Marble mountains
text: You must pay entrance fee. (60VND). View from top is beautifull. Be carefull, in the town you can buy many souveniers, which could be from real marble.

title: Monkey circus
text: You can see circus on the island. Monkey drive, bude, motorbike, swim, ride on dogs. You can bet. Can not recomend, because monkey suffer.

title: Very good pho
text: Delicious pho. One of the the best in the Vietnam. Very clear restaurant a very kind and helfull staff.

title: big statue and pagoda
text: Lady budha is dominant statue of Danang. You can see it from beach very well. Good trip which recomend visit with monkey mountains together

title: You must see at night
text: Very nice bridge, every satuday and sunday at 9pm is there fire show from dragon mounth. Recomend it see it

title: Recomend
text: Delicious Italian pizza. Very kind staff who gave us many information about Danang. I can recomend.........
